title: Add Fit Driver Selection Wizard with recommended defaults

sections.text: Implement a guided fit driver selection step in the setup flow that pre-populates recommended drivers based on connected data sources (CRM fields, surveys, usage events, support tickets). Provide short explanations and an “accept all” option, while allowing users to add/remove drivers before continuing. Persist the selected drivers and defaults to the workspace so downstream fit scoring uses the same configuration.
